title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8191-1.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8191-1.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply as follows: (a) (1)

Sections
8191-2.1
through
8191-2.4
of this Part shall apply to all counties within the State, except the counties
located wholly within the boundaries of the City of New York. (2)

Section
8191-2.5
of this Part shall apply to the City of New York. (b) Subparts 8191-3 through 8191-4 of this

Part shall apply to all assessing units within the State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8191-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
